quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice, you cannot choose what happens, but you can choose your reaction to it and be happy.
Happiness grows at our own firesides, and is not to be picked in strangers' gardens.
Happiness is never stopping to think if you are.
If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
The only reason you are happy is because you choose to be happy. Happiness is a choice, and so is suffering.
The secret to happiness is to put the burden of proof on unhappiness.
Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
Stop looking for happiness in the same place you lost.
The pursuit of happiness is a most ridiculous phrase: if you pursue happiness you'll never find it.
Whatever you set aside to seek happiness, remember where you put it.
Happiness is a way of travel not a destination.
We all have hapiness inside and it's not at all hard to find. It's sealed deep in our hearts and guarded by our soul. You don't have to beg to use it. All you have to do is choose it!
There are two things to aim at in life: first, to get what you want; and after that, to enjoy it. Only the wisest of mankind achieve the second.
Two things prevent us from happiness; living in the past and observing others.
Happiness is a present attitude and not a future condition.
If you want to be happy you have to work to make it happen. You can't just wish for it and you can't put it in the hands of other people.
Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
You can only have bliss if you don't chase it.
Happiness is a state of mental,physical and spiritual well-being. Think pleasantly,engaged sport and read daily to enhance your well-being.
There is no way to happiness - happiness is the way.
The art of happiness is to serve all. To be truly happy, we must think not only of how we can help ourselves, but how we can help others.
In life everyone has a choice. The key is: make a right choice.
Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
Happiness is the feeling you're feeling when you want to keep feeling it.
People take different roads seeking fulfillment and happiness. Just because they're not on your road doesn't mean they've gotten lost.
Happiness is a choice I am making now. Once we understand that and find love consciousness, we learn that this place of internal plenitude needs nothing.
It is the chiefest point of happiness that a man is willing to be what he is.
No one can grant you happiness. Happiness is a choice we all have the power to make.
Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times.
Happiness is a choice. You grieve, you stomp your feet, you pick yourself up and choose to be happy.
Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.

Happiness is a choice, not a result. Nothing will make you happy until you choose to be happy. No person will make you happy unless you decide to be happy. Your happiness will not come to you. It can only come from you.
Happiness is a choice, a repetitive one.
We often feel paralyzed by choice and make no choice. But the thing is, no choice is a choice. If you're not doing something about it, you're doing something about it.
A life by choice is one that is filled with love, happiness, and an appreciation of each day.
Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
Happiness is the secret to all beauty; there is no beauty that is attractive without happiness.
Happiness is a conscious choice, not an automatic response.
Ask yourself whether you are happy and you cease to be so.

Happiness is the first principle of life. Happiness basically means well-being. It is always good and always a choiceâ€¦ We need to make the choice to be happy in a particular situation, just as it is, and at a given moment.
No choice is the wrong choice as long as you make a choice. The only wrong choice is choosing not to make one.
We tend to seek happiness when happiness is actually a choice
Feeling happy or hurt by every little thing is a choice that makes life beautiful or ugly.
You cannot always have happiness, but you can always give happiness.
If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
It is never too late to make happiness your choice of life.
Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
There can be no happiness if the things we believe in are different from the things we do.
Happiness is a conditioning of the mind and body so that happiness is totally within the way you perceive things and handle situations in life. You choose to be happy; happiness doesn't choose you.
